00021 #include "CHPQuantificationFileReader.h"
00022 #include "CalvinCHPQuantificationFileUpdater.h"
00023 #include "CalvinCHPQuantificationFileUpdaterTest.h"
00024 #include "CalvinCHPQuantificationFileWriter.h"
00025 
00026 using namespace std;
00027 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00028 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_data;
00029 
00030 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( CalvinCHPQuantificationFileUpdaterTest );
00031 
00032 #define TEST_FILE "data_file.quantificationupdater_test"
00033 
00034 void CalvinCHPQuantificationFileUpdaterTest::setUp()
00035 {
00036 }
00037 
00038 void CalvinCHPQuantificationFileUpdaterTest::CreateReferenceFile()
00039 {
00040         CHPQuantificationData data(TEST_FILE);
00041         data.SetEntryCount(4, 10);
00042         CHPQuantificationFileWriter *writer = new CHPQuantificationFileWriter(data);
00043         ProbeSetQuantificationData e;
00044 
00045         writer->SeekToDataSet();
00046         e.name = "1";
00047         e.quantification = 10.0f;
00048         writer->WriteEntry(e);
00049         e.name = "2";
00050         e.quantification = 20.0f;
00051         writer->WriteEntry(e);
00052         e.name = "3";
00053         e.quantification = 30.0f;
00054         writer->WriteEntry(e);
00055         e.name = "4";
00056         e.quantification = 40.0f;
00057         writer->WriteEntry(e);
00058 
00059         delete writer;
00060 }
00061 
00062 void CalvinCHPQuantificationFileUpdaterTest::tearDown()
00063 {
00064 }
00065 
00066 void CalvinCHPQuantificationFileUpdaterTest::testQuantification()
00067 {
00068         CreateReferenceFile();
00069 
00070         CalvinCHPQuantificationFileUpdater upd;
00071         upd.Initialize(TEST_FILE);
00072         upd.UpdateQuantification(0, 123.0f);
00073         upd.UpdateQuantification(2, 222.0f);
00074 
00075         CHPQuantificationData data;
00076         CHPQuantificationFileReader reader;
00077         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(TEST_FILE));
00078         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00079         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetEntryCount() == 4);
00080 
00081         ProbeSetQuantificationData e;
00082         data.GetQuantificationEntry(0, e);
00083         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.name == "1");
00084         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.quantification, 123.0f, 0.000001f);
00085         data.GetQuantificationEntry(1, e);
00086         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.name == "2");
00087         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.quantification, 20.0f, 0.000001f);
00088         data.GetQuantificationEntry(2, e);
00089         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.name == "3");
00090         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.quantification, 222.0f, 0.000001f);
00091         data.GetQuantificationEntry(3, e);
00092         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.name == "4");
00093         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.quantification, 40.0f, 0.000001f);
00094 }
